Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to disability retirement benefits for Dennis Malone, a participant in World Trade Center rescue, recovery, and cleanup operations
Summary: Entitles Dennis Malone, an employee of the Town of Clarkstown who retired from such service on August 16, 2018, and who participated in the World Trade Center rescue, recovery and cleanup operations to a 75% accidental disability retirement benefit.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to disability retirement benefits for Dennis Malone, a participant in World Trade Center rescue, recovery, and cleanup operations
